function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Labour shortages in the construction industry due to COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased productivity and delayed project completion","Mitigation":"Implement offsite construction and second shift schedules","Technologies":"Offsite construction technology","People":"Construction workers, contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate communication and training on COVID-19 interventions for businesses","Impact":"Lack of awareness and understanding of latest interventions and scenarios","Mitigation":"Establish better communication channels and provide clear updates and training","Technologies":"Communication technology, training platforms","People":"Business owners, project managers","Owner":"Industry associations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Disputes between employers and contractors due to lack of timely notices","Impact":"Increased likelihood of breach of contract and legal disputes","Mitigation":"Implement timely serving of notices to prevent disputes","Technologies":"Contract management software, notification systems","People":"Employers, contractors","Owner":"Legal teams, project managers"}]}
